resources.string: This app needs Admin privilege to Lock the phone from wear device, These changes are easily reversible, please enable admin privilege for the function to work properly

This app needs Admin privilege to Lock the phone
 from wear device, These changes are easily reversible, 
 please enable admin privilege for the function to 
 work properly

Let me explain it this way, Imagine a situation 
 where your phone is in someone else's hand, 
 may be your friend, but you are worried 
 if he/she is gonna see something they aren't suppose to. 
 Then
Open \"Wear lock\" app in your Wear device \n and press Lock button. that\'s it. \n your phone is locked Remotely
As per android policy The app need \nAdmin privilege to lock the device.

*all set? and still don\'t know what to do? open up \"wear lock\" in connected wear device.\n and press \"Lock phone\" button to lock instantly, or swipe left and press\n \"Ring my phone\" to Alert your phone.
Please make sure this app is running in background
